verses.verse: "And <WG2532> to the angel <WG32> of the assembly <WG1577> in <WG1722> Sardis <WG4554> write: <WG1125> "He who has <WG2192> the seven <WG2033> Spirits <WG4151> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> the seven <WG2033> stars <WG792> says <WG3004> these things: <WG3592> "I know <WG1492> your <WG4675> works, <WG2041> that <WG3754> you have <WG2192> a reputation <WG3686> of <WG3754> being alive, <WG2198> but <WG2532> you are <WG1488> dead. <WG3498>

Remember <WG3421> therefore <WG3767> how <WG4459> you have received <WG2983> and <WG2532> heard. <WG191> <WG2532> Keep <WG5083> it, <WG2532> and repent. <WG3340> If <WG1437> therefore <WG3767> you won't <WG3361> watch, <WG1127> I will come <WG2240> <WG4571> as <WG5613> a thief, <WG2812> and <WG2532> you <WG4571> won't <WG3756> <WG3361> know <WG1097> what <WG4169> hour <WG5610> I will come <WG2240> upon <WG1909> you. <WG4571>

Nevertheless you have <WG2192> a few <WG3641> names <WG3686> <WG2532> in <WG1722> Sardis <WG4554> that <WG3739> did <WG3435> not <WG3756> defile <WG3435> their <WG846> garments. <WG2440> <WG2532> They will walk <WG4043> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> in <WG1722> white, <WG3022> for <WG3754> they are <WG1526> worthy. <WG514>

He who overcomes <WG3528> will be <WG3778> arrayed <WG4016> in <WG1722> white <WG3022> garments, <WG2440> and <WG2532> I <WG3361> will <WG1813> in no <WG3756> way <WG3361> blot his <WG846> name <WG3686> out of <WG1537> the book <WG976> of life, <WG2222> and <WG2532> I will confess <WG1843> his <WG846> name <WG3686> before <WG1799> my <WG3450> Father, <WG3962> and <WG2532> before <WG1799> his <WG846> angels. <WG32>
He who has <WG2192> an ear, <WG3775> let him hear <WG191> what <WG5101> the Spirit <WG4151> says <WG3004> to the assemblies. <WG1577>

<WG2532> "To the angel <WG32> of the assembly <WG1577> in <WG1722> Philadelphia <WG5359> write: <WG1125> "He who is holy, <WG40> he who is true, <WG228> he who has <WG2192> the key <WG2807> of David, <WG1138> he who opens <WG455> and <WG2532> no one <WG3762> can shut, <WG2808> and <WG2532> who shuts <WG2808> and <WG2532> no one <WG3762> opens, <WG455> says <WG3004> these things: <WG3592>

"I know <WG1492> your <WG4675> works <WG2041> (behold, <WG2400> I have set <WG1325> before <WG1799> you <WG4675> an open <WG455> door, <WG2374> which <WG2532> no one <WG3762> can <WG1410> shut <WG2808>), <WG846> that <WG3754> you have <WG2192> a little <WG3398> power, <WG1411> and <WG2532> kept <WG5083> my <WG3450> word, <WG3056> and <WG2532> didn't <WG720> <WG3756> deny <WG720> my <WG3450> name. <WG3686>

Behold, <WG2400> I give <WG1325> of <WG1537> the synagogue <WG4864> of Satan, <WG4567> of those <WG3004> who say <WG3004> they <WG1438> are <WG1511> Jews, <WG2453> and <WG2532> they are <WG1526> not, <WG3756> but <WG235> lie. <WG5574> Behold, <WG2400> I will make <WG4160> them <WG846> to <WG2443> come <WG2240> and <WG2532> worship <WG4352> before <WG1799> your <WG4675> feet, <WG4228> and <WG2532> to know <WG1097> that <WG3754> I <WG1473> have loved <WG25> you. <WG4571>

Because <WG3754> you kept <WG5083> my <WG3450> command <WG3056> to endure, <WG5281> I also <WG2504> will keep <WG5083> you <WG4571> from <WG1537> the hour <WG5610> of testing, <WG3986> which <WG3588> is <WG2064> to come <WG3195> on <WG1909> the whole <WG3650> world, <WG3625> to test <WG3985> those who dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth. <WG1093>

<WG2400> I am coming <WG2064> quickly! <WG5035> Hold <WG2902> firmly <WG2902> that <WG3739> which <WG3739> you have, <WG2192> so that <WG2443> no one <WG3367> takes <WG2983> your <WG4675> crown. <WG4735>

He <WG846> who overcomes, <WG3528> I will make <WG4160> him a pillar <WG4769> in <WG1722> the temple <WG3485> of <WG2316> my <WG3450> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> he will go <WG1831> out <WG1854> from there no <WG3756> <WG3361> more. <WG2089> <WG2532> I will write <WG1125> on <WG1909> him <WG846> the name <WG3686> of <WG2316> my <WG3450> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> the name <WG3686> of the city <WG4172> of <WG1537> my <WG3450> God, <WG2316> the new <WG2537> Jerusalem, <WG2419> which <WG3588> comes down <WG2597> out of <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> from <WG575> my <WG3450> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> own new <WG2537> name. <WG3686>

<WG2532> "To the angel <WG32> of the assembly <WG1577> in Laodicea <WG2994> write: <WG1125> "The Amen, <WG281> the Faithful <WG4103> and <WG2532> True <WG228> Witness, <WG3144> the Head <WG746> of God <WG2316>'s creation, <WG2937> says <WG3004> these things: <WG3592>

"I know <WG1492> your <WG4675> works, <WG2041> that <WG3754> you are <WG1488> neither <WG3777> cold <WG5593> nor <WG3777> hot. <WG2200> I wish <WG3785> you were <WG1498> cold <WG5593> or <WG2228> hot. <WG2200>

So, <WG3779> because <WG3754> you are <WG1488> lukewarm, <WG5513> and <WG2532> neither <WG3777> hot <WG2200> nor <WG3777> cold, <WG5593> I will <WG3195> vomit <WG1692> you <WG4571> out of <WG1537> my <WG3450> mouth. <WG4750>

Because <WG3754> you say, <WG3004> <WG1510> 'I am rich, <WG4145> and <WG2532> have gotten riches, <WG4147> and <WG2532> have <WG2192> need <WG5532> of nothing; <WG3762>' and <WG2532> don't <WG3756> know <WG1492> that <WG3754> you <WG4771> are <WG1488> the wretched <WG5005> one, <WG2532> miserable, <WG1652> <WG2532> poor, <WG4434> <WG2532> blind, <WG5185> and <WG2532> naked; <WG3754>

I counsel <WG4823> you <WG4671> to buy <WG59> from <WG3844> me <WG1700> gold <WG5553> refined <WG4448> by <WG1537> fire, <WG4442> that <WG2443> you may become rich; <WG4147> and <WG2532> white <WG3022> garments, <WG2440> that <WG2443> you may clothe <WG4016> yourself, <WG2532> and that the shame <WG152> of <WG1132> your <WG4675> nakedness <WG1132> may not <WG3361> be revealed; <WG5319> and <WG2532> eye salve <WG2854> to anoint <WG1472> your <WG4675> eyes, <WG3788> that <WG2443> you may see. <WG991>
As many as <WG3745> I <WG1473> love, <WG5368> I <WG1473> reprove <WG1651> and <WG2532> chasten. <WG3811> Be zealous <WG2206> therefore, <WG3767> and <WG2532> repent. <WG3340>

Behold, <WG2400> I stand <WG2476> at <WG1909> the door <WG2374> and <WG2532> knock. <WG2925> If <WG1437> anyone <WG5100> hears <WG191> my <WG3450> voice <WG5456> and <WG2532> opens <WG455> the door, <WG2374> then I will come in <WG1525> to <WG4314> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> will dine <WG1172> with <WG3326> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> he <WG846> with <WG3326> me. <WG1700>

He <WG846> who overcomes, <WG3528> I will give <WG1325> to him to sit <WG2523> down with <WG3326> me <WG1700> on <WG1722> my <WG3450> throne, <WG2362> as <WG5613> I also <WG2504> overcame, <WG3528> and <WG2532> sat down <WG2523> with <WG3326> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> on <WG1722> his <WG846> throne. <WG2362>
